name: Magical
description: The weapon targets Magic Defense instead of Defense.

name: Hunter
description: The weapon deals 5 extra damage to creatures of a particular Species.

name: Piercing
description: Damage dealt by the weapon ignores Resistances.

name: Dual Hunter
description: The weapon deals 5 extra damage to creatures belonging to one of two particular Species.

name: Multi
description: Attacks with the weapon have multi (2).

name: Status
description: Each target hit by the weapon suffers (choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).

name: Status Plus
description: Each target hit by the weapon suffers (choose one: enraged, poisoned).
